alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 8:54PM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
